mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAUTION(CA_NO, ME_EMAIL, CA_REASON, CA_REG) VALUES(SEQ_CA.NEXTVAL, #{meEmail}, #{caReason}, #{caReg})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(CA_CLOSE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as caCloseStr FROM CAUTION WHERE CA_NO = ( SELECT CA_NO FROM ( SELECT ME_EMAIL, MAX(CA_NO) AS CA_NO FROM CAUTION WHERE ME_EMAIL = #{meEmail} GROUP BY ME_EMAIL ) )
